description:
With a history that dates back more than 40 years, the Grimes Teich Anderson law firm in Spartanburg, South Carolina, has delivered highly effective, personalized representation and support to clients throughout the area and beyond who have legal needs involving personal injury, wrongful death, workers' compensation, Social Security Disability, veterans benefits, employment law and more.

Nationally recognized as among the top trial advocates in the country, our attorneys have earned AV Preeminent peer-review ratings* through Martindale-Hubbell along with recognition from Best Lawyers and Top 100 Trial Lawyer rankings from the National Trial Lawyers. In addition, we have received Superb client ratings on Avvo as well as many testimonials from our satisfied clients, and we promise to utilize the full extent of our vast legal knowledge and resources to handle your matter efficiently and to increase your chances for obtaining the full amount of compensation you deserve.

Over the course of our time in practice, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, earning our membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum. We have also expanded our law firm to include eight total offices across the Carolinas, making us one of our region's most prominent personal injury and employment law practices.

Whether you suffered an injury or loss in a car accident or some other preventable tragedy or you experienced a violation of your rights as a worker, you can begin the process of retaining the best possible counsel for your legal challenge by contacting Grimes Teich Anderson and scheduling a free initial consultation with one of our dedicated team members.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating™ fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.

Best Lawyers® and The Best Lawyers in America© are registered trademarks of BL Rankings, LLC d/b/a Best Lawyers and Co., LLC. The names, logo, and database are protected under the trademark, copyright, and fair use laws of the United States of America. Any use of name, including in electronic form, must be made only by permission and under the guidelines of BL Rankings, LLC d/b/a Best Lawyers and Co., LLC.
